changelog.title: Latest updates
changelog.heat_details: {LINK} is a Twitch extensions allowing viewers to click on your stream. Twitchat makes it dead easy to use it.

highlights.d:
Receive your TikTok Live messages and notifications directly in Twitchat!

Automate actions with new Triggers dedicated to TikTok.

Automate actions when you smile, raise your eyebrows, open your mouth, turn your head, and much more.
Also simulate pressing keyboard keys or mouse buttons from Triggers.

PlayAbility aims to make video games accessible to people with disabilities. Its integration with Twitchat allows you to enhance interactivity in your streams by, for example, enabling your viewers to shoot for you in an FPS by subscribing to your channel. Or count the number of times you smile or raise your eyebrows.

Twitchat allows you to exchange private messages with your moderators using Twitchat.

Your mods can quote chat messages and ask you questions you can then answer with one click to ease communications with them.
Trigger Streamer.bot actions from Twitchat's Triggers to combine Twitchat's exclusive features with all the possibilities offered by Streamer.bot.
Trigger SAMMI buttons from Twitchat's Triggers to combine Twitchat's exclusive features with all the possibilities offered by SAMMI.
Trigger Mix It Up commands from Twitchat's Triggers to combine Twitchat's exclusive features with all the possibilities offered by Mix It Up.

Twitchat now allows you to use ElevenLabs voices to read your messages.
ElevenLabs offers much more realistic synthetic voices than those previously offered by Twitchat.

Twitchat now notifies when a donation is made to an ongoing charity campaign.

Automate actions with the new dedicated Trigger.

Allow joining a raffle for each donation made to the campaign.

The Goals overlay is compatible with Twitch charity campaign.

You can now link Twitchat with a secondary bot account.
All bot messages will be sent through this account instead of yours.
Display your active Patreon members with the new "Patreon Members" section
The Spotify trigger action allows you to limit the number of tracks a person can add to the queue.

Ko-Fi has extremely restrictive functionality and only allows connecting an account to one third party application only.

Twitchat now allows you to bypass this limitation by letting you define up to 5 alternative URLs to which Ko-Fi events can be retransmitted.

22 new labels available on the Labels overlay.
  • Number of viewers on TikTok
  • Total number of likes on the TikTok live
  • Username of the last TikTok like
  • Avatar of the last TikTok like
  • Number of likes sent
  • Username of the last TikTok subscription
  • Avatar of the last TikTok subscription
  • Username of the last TikTok share
  • Avatar of the last TikTok share
  • Username of the last TikTok gift
  • Avatar of the last TikTok gift
  • Image of the last TikTok gift
  • Quantity of the last TikTok gift
  • Diamonds received with the last TikTok gift
  • Twitch Charity - Campaign name
  • Twitch Charity - Campaign image
  • Twitch Charity - Amount raised
  • Twitch Charity - Goal
  • Twitch Charity - Last donor
  • Twitch Charity - Last donation
  • Twitch Charity - Last donation avatar
  • Patreon - Number of active members

18 new trigger events:
  • Chat cleared
  • Sub-only enabled/disabled
  • Followers-only enabled/disabled
  • Emote-only enabled/disabled
  • Slow mode enabled/disabled
  • User monitored
  • User restricted
  • Monitoring/restriction lifted
  • Donation received on Twitch charity campaign
  • PlayAbility action detected
  • TikTok - New subscription
  • TikTok - Like received
  • TikTok - Gift received
  • TikTok - Stream shared

Many other things have been added or modified.
